title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.5 - Payment of toll
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.5 - Payment of toll

State Regulations

All vehicles which intend to cross any bridge shall first pay
the toll prescribed by section
5502.1
of this Chapter at the
regularly established places or booths for the collection of such
tolls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
